source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static shot from inside a room, looking out a window at a city skyline. The sky is dark and filled with strange, swirling, luminous pink and purple clouds or energy formations. A silhouetted plant is visible in the foreground on the right.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video is not a static shot. The sky is dark grey and features unusual, swirling, luminous orange and white clouds or energy formations.

The sky is dark grey and filled with unusual, swirling, luminous orange and white clouds or energy formations. A silhouetted plant is visible in the foreground on the right.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video captures a dynamic view from inside a room, looking out a window at a city skyline. The sky is dark grey and filled with unusual, swirling, luminous orange and white clouds or energy formations. A silhouetted plant is visible in the foreground on the right.

generated_critique: The caption focuses on describing the static scene rather than the motion of the subjects as instructed. It also includes the subjective adjective "unusual" and the speculative phrase "clouds or energy formations," which violates the guidelines. The description omits the motion of the small, dark particles drifting downward in the foreground. The caption should be rewritten to describe only the movement, detailing how the luminous formations swirl across the sky and how the dark particles drift down.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: Luminous pink and purple formations swirl and drift across a dark sky, while small, dark particles float downward in the foreground.
